key.name: window-properties
key.summary: The window position and size, [width, height, x, y]
key.description: Stores the manager window's width, height and x, y position on screen

key.name: last-adapter
key.description: This stores the lass adapter device selected in Manager

key.name: services-last-item
key.description: Stores the selected tab id number in the Services UI

key.name: show-toolbar
key.description: Show or hide Manager's ToolBar

key.name: show-statusbar
key.description: Show or hide the Manager's StatusBar

key.name: sort-by
key.description: Sort the device list by column, possible values are timestamp and alias

key.name: plugin-list
key.description: Stores which plugins have been disabled/enabled by the user. Note plugins have a default whether it should be loaded or not and this only stores the plugins enabled/disabled by the user

key.name: gsm-list
key.summary: List of gsm which have apn settings

key.name: netusage-dev-list
key.summary: List of devices we have netusage data stored.

key.name: notification-daemon
key.description: If this is set to false blueman always uses its internal fallback notification dialog and does not invoke a notification daemon. Otherwise the fallback dialog will only be used if actions need to be displayed and the notification daemon does not report to support them.

key.name: apn
key.description: Bluetooth APN

key.name: number
key.description: Phone Number

key.name: nmdunuuid
key.description: The uuid of the NM DUN Connection which may not exist anymore

key.name: nmpanuuid
key.description: The uuid of the NM PANU Connection which may not exist anymore

key.name: tx
key.description: Transmit

key.name: rx
key.description: Recieve

key.name: time
key.description: Current TimeStamp

key.name: services
key.description: A list of services to connect to stored as tuples with the address and the UUID

key.name: max-items
key.description: Maximum number of items recent connections menu will display

key.name: recent-connections
key.description: A list of recently connected devices stored as a dictionary

key.name: script
key.description: The following arguments will be passed: "Address, Name, service name, uuid16s, rfcomm node". For example: "AA:BB:CC:DD:EE:FF, Phone, DUN service, 0x1103, /dev/rfcomm0". uuid16s are returned as a comma seperated list. Upon device disconnection the script will be sent a HUP signal"

key.name: time
key.description: Amount of time in seconds discoverable mode will last
